text: Plag, PLAG, or plag may refer to: * PLAG1, a protein * Plagiarism, the wrongful appropriation of another author's work ** PlagTracker, a plagiarism detection software ** PlagScan, a plagiarism detection software ** VroniPlag Wiki, a wiki on plagiarism in German doctoral theses * Plagioclase, a solid solution series of minerals in the feldspar group
title: Plag
